scripts.build: mkdir -p $HOME/.local/bin $HOME/.yt-cache && (curl -L --max-time 60 --retry 3 https://github.com/yt-dlp/yt-dlp/releases/latest/download/yt-dlp -o $HOME/.local/bin/yt-dlp && chmod +x $HOME/.local/bin/yt-dlp && echo 'yt-dlp installed via curl') || (pip3 install --user --break-system-packages yt-dlp 2>/dev/null || pip3 install --user yt-dlp 2>/dev/null || pip install --user yt-dlp 2>/dev/null && echo 'yt-dlp installed via pip') || echo 'yt-dlp install deferred to runtime' && npm install
